thread.title: Harper Urges President to Sign National Defense Authorization Act (Gregg Harper)
thread.title_full: Harper Urges President to Sign National Defense Authorization Act (Gregg Harper) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Harper Urges President to Sign National Defense Authorization Act (Gregg Harper)
text: ( Source : Gregg Harper ) Washington D.C. - U.S. Rep. Gregg Harper released the following statement calling for the President to sign the National Defense Authorization Act ( NDAA ) into law, after the House and the Senate advanced legislation
